about_the_game:
This 3D model resource pack allows you to combine multiple parts to create various types of private houses of various sizes.

Details (including parts and finished products)
  • Brick house:24
  • Thatched-roof house: 25
  • Wooden house:27
  • Additional windows:14
  • Chimneys:3
  • Balcony:12
  • Signs:12
detailed_description:
This 3D model resource pack allows you to combine multiple parts to create various types of private houses of various sizes.

Details (including parts and finished products)
  • Brick house:24
  • Thatched-roof house: 25
  • Wooden house:27
  • Additional windows:14
  • Chimneys:3
  • Balcony:12
  • Signs:12
name: RPG Developer Bakin House Pack Vol.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics board running OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed in virtual or emulated environments.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed in virtual or emulated environments.

short_description: This 3D model resource pack allows you to combine multiple parts to create various types of private houses of various sizes.
